dict.acceptation: 狭隘的；狭窄的；（种类或数目）有限的；仔细的，精确的；
限制，限定；（使）变窄；变得更窄；收缩；
海峡；狭路，隘路；狭窄的水道；

sent.orig: This is our internationalism, the internationalism with which we oppose both narrow nationalism and narrow patriotism.
sent.trans: 这就是我们的国际主义，这就是我们用以反对狭隘民族主义和狭隘爱国主义的国际主义。

sent.orig: A narrow place is very big to the narrow minded.
sent.trans: 窄小的地方对狭隘的心灵来讲是足够宽大的。

sent.orig: It is narrow after the bed narrow almirah, the bookshelf of loom.
sent.trans: 床后是窄窄的衣橱，隐约可见的书架。

sent.orig: The vehicle zigzagged in the crowd and finally arrived at a narrow street.
sent.trans: 车子在人群中拐来拐去拐到了斜街。

sent.orig: I have to share my office with another three persons, so our space is quite narrow.
sent.trans: 我必须和另外三个人公用我的办公室，所以我们的空间很狭窄。
